item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: Ormus_n2o
item.description:
Creating thread i was hoping for more posts about inteview not his hair/look. Anyway. Interview suck cuz machinima din’t organise it too good. This was his 1st time in front camera and i’m sure he was little stressed. New episode of Civil Protection is on the way. There is only audio work to do. Here is his website
https://www.accursedfarms.com

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: doomyshadowsquirrels
item.description:
I’ve never seen his face before. I’ll put his picture on my ‘Do Not Kill’ list.

The interview was terrible. But it was great to hear that he has dozens of episodes ideas, and his cotton-gin analogy was spot-on xD

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
MarshmallowRadiation:

I can totally picture Freeman encountering two metrocops named Dave and Mike in ep3.

I would find it to be more relaxed to meet Mike and Dave in Rebel form. Then you would be able to interact with them, besides a bullet to the brain : D

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: MarshmallowRadiation
item.description:
Lukagerm:

I think it would be cool for him to have a part or a cameo in a game.

I can totally picture Freeman encountering two metrocops named Dave and Mike in ep3.

item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: Lukagerm
item.description:
I saw Ross Scott’s name in the thread title and I thought it was going to be news that Ross Scott had been hired by Valve to do voice work.
Sadly, it wasn’t but I think it would be cool for him to have a part or a cameo in a game.

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: Luigis_1
item.description:
kinda bugged me that the host was only asking about Freemans Mind. I know for a fact Ross cares a bit more for Civil Protection and that Freemans Mind was just a sub project to please the fans between CP episodes.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: GilCMassey
item.description:
“I said hi to Ross Scott” :lol:

But anyways. Yeah, this is pretty much how I imagined him, but his hair was a little longer than I thought.

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
Ross said that he couldn’t see the interviewee so was flying blind there…which is why he had that plastered smile on his face when that other guy came in. Horrible interview (not Ross’ fault) but I’m glad to see Ross’ face and actually see him talking.

Read full topic
item.source: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.title: Ross Scott (Freeman Mind, Civil Protection) interview.

item.description:
O god that was almost as painful as a G4 interview.

Ross was about what I expected. But yah maybe a little shorter hair in my mine.
